NAME: FURBALL
DESC: The ordinary FURBALL is a penguin-duck combination, with a slight hint of cat. A real menace.

NAME: BABY FURBALL
DESC: They would do anything for their teddy. A pacifier and bottle keep them from crying.

NAME: DRUG DEALER FURBALL
DESC: This noble FURBALL sells drugs in MERCURY DRUGSTORE to earn a living and support his children.

NAME: CAT FURBALL
DESC: Even more cat-like than the norm, CAT FURBALLs purr and roll around a lot, especially when they hear music.

NAME: BRAINIAC FURBALL
DESC: Dangerously smart crazy scientist FURBALL that has experimented on his own body.

NAME: RICH FURBALL
DESC: FURBALLs which have made it big in the business world through fair means or foul.

NAME: BEDTIME FURBALL
DESC: Sleeps in the light, lives in the night, BEDTIME FURBALLs keep the world working right.

NAME: WI-FI FURBALL
DESC: WI-FI FURBALLs connect the FURBALL NET together by amplifying space satellite signals.

NAME: BEE FURBALL
DESC: BEE FURBALLs cannot talk; instead, they use flying dances to communicate with each other.

NAME: APPLE FURBALL
DESC: Falling from trees like raindrops from cloud, APPLE FURBALLs defend the FOREST from worms.

NAME: WAR FURBALL
DESC: WAR FURBALLs are experienced veterans that actually despise war; they would never want another.

NAME: GHOST FURBALL
DESC: Haunts the FURBALL GRAVES at night with a dark aura, scaring away SOAPs that dare tresspass.

NAME: ANGEL FURBALL
DESC: Goody-two-shoes FURBALLs that always seems to say what he thinks is right.

NAME: DEVIL FURBALL
DESC: Baddy-two-shoes FURBALLs that always seems to say what he thinks is wrong.

NAME: JUDGE FURBALL
DESC: The father of ANGEL and DEVIL FURBALLs who judges trials using the ORATRICE MECANIQUE D'ANALYSE FURBINALE.

NAME: BOMB FURBALL
DESC: He supposedly self-destructs when very stressed, so he tries to keep calm despite everything.

NAME: EXPLOSION FURBALL
DESC: A fan of a certain CRIMSON DEMON, he seeks to master only EXPLOSION MAGIC and nothing else.

NAME: SIMP FURBALL
DESC: Lonely, a bit creepy; spends too much effort and love on strangers he finds online.

NAME: STEAMPUNK FURBALL
DESC: The INDUSTRIAL REVOLUTION inspired STEAMPUNK FURBALLs to use steam in unique ways.

NAME: SIR FURBALL
DESC: Swore to live by FURBALL CHIVALRY.

NAME: KUNG FURBALL
DESC: Fast as lightning, a little bit frightening, with expert timing, kung fu fighting.

NAME: FURBALL WITH A KNIFE
DESC: An ordinary FURBALL becomes stronger when they get a knife, as if they always knew how to use one.

NAME: DIRTBALL
DESC: These smaller-than-usual FURBALLs plan ambushes from dirt holes at the FUR-TANOOK FRONTIER.

NAME: EMBLEM FURBALL
DESC: The prince of a small kingdom who leads his subjects to tactical victories. Wields an enchanted sword.

NAME: BUSY FURBALL
DESC: Always busy and on the phone, BUSY FURBALLs hope to become a RICH FURBALL sooner or later.

NAME: GUITARHERO FURBALL
DESC: A shut-in that's very popular online due to guitar covers. Recently spotted playing in a band of four.

NAME: SAMURAI FURBALL
DESC: Swore to live by FURBALL BUSHIDO.

NAME: COMPUTER FURBALL
DESC: The fastest thinker of FURBALL WORLD, but he must always be in contact with technicians to work.

NAME: SURFER FURBALL
DESC: He doesn't actually ride the waves very well, but he makes up for it with his great swimming skills.

NAME: ZEPHYRION FURBALL
DESC: Flies like a rhythm across the blue into the firmament; wears a certain headpiece as a memento from long ago.

NAME: BOMBER FURBALL
DESC: Places down special bombs that explode in a '+' formation that apparently break only brown bricks.

NAME: POLICE FURBALL
DESC: Maintains a degree of peace in NEW FURBALL CITY, preventing SOAPs and TANOOKBALLs from doing anything.

NAME: 1999 BIZARRE FURBALL
DESC: Unashamedly sports hair from the 'GREAT DAYS'. Holds a hidden power to stand up against his enemies.

NAME: SUN FURBALL
DESC: He sacrificed his life to become a sun, allowing FURBALLs to see the color yellow.

NAME: ENERGY FURBALL
DESC: The combined teamwork and mind synchronization of many FURBALLs causes a powerful ENERGY FURBALL to emerge.
